Unrecognized: a satellite image patch with unrecognized land cover
a remote sensing image patch with unclear land cover type
an aerial image patch of mixed or unknown land cover
a satellite view of land cover that cannot be confidently categorized
a remote sensing patch with ambiguous terrain appearance
Farmland: a satellite image patch of farmland
a remote sensing image of agricultural fields
an aerial image showing crop fields and cultivated land
a satellite view of planted fields and farm plots
a remote sensing patch with farmland patterns and field boundaries
Water: a satellite image patch of water
a remote sensing image of river or lake water
an aerial image showing water bodies and waterways
a satellite view of a river, canal, or pond
a remote sensing patch dominated by water surface
Forest: a satellite image patch of forest
a remote sensing image of dense tree cover
an aerial image showing forest canopy
a satellite view of woodland with continuous vegetation cover
a remote sensing patch with dark green forest texture
Built-Up: a satellite image patch of built-up area
a remote sensing image of urban structures and roads
an aerial image showing buildings, streets, and residential areas
a satellite view of dense urban development
a remote sensing patch with man-made structures and paved surfaces
Meadow: a satellite image patch of meadow
a remote sensing image of grassland
an aerial image showing open green vegetation and meadow
a satellite view of open grassy land with sparse trees
a remote sensing patch of natural vegetation and meadow-like fields
